text: (Ayinum porukkuc cellatatu parri) antakar mitum kurram illai mutavar mitum kurram illai noyali mitum kurram illai - anriyum evar allahvukkum, avarutaiya tutarukkum valippatukiraro, avarai (allah) cuvarkkankalil viravecikkac ceyvan; avarrin kile arukal otikkontirukkum; anal evan pin vankukirano, avanai (allah) novinai tarum vetanaiyaka vetanai ceyvan
